PHASE 2 COORDINATION

Integration Cost Engine - the core entropy computation system.

Module ownership:
- Agent coherence: owns notebook-entropy/src/coherence.rs, clustering logic
- Agent entropy: owns notebook-entropy/src/engine.rs, cost computation
- Agent calibration: owns notebook-entropy/src/calibration.rs, thresholds
- Agent propagation: owns notebook-entropy/src/propagation.rs, background jobs

DEPENDENCY GRAPH:
```
Task 2.1 (coherence model)
    |
    v
Task 2.2 (cost computation)
    |
    +---> Task 2.3 (orphan threshold)
    +---> Task 2.4 (retroactive propagation)
    +---> Task 2.5 (endpoint integration)
```

WAVE 1: Task 2.1 only (coherence model must be defined first)
WAVE 2: Task 2.2 (builds on coherence model)
WAVE 3: Tasks 2.3, 2.4, 2.5 in parallel

DESIGN PRINCIPLES:
- Coherence is approximate (keyword overlap, TF-IDF) - not semantic embeddings
- Integration cost computed synchronously on write (500ms budget)
- Retroactive propagation is async background job
- All computation happens in notebook-entropy crate
